name: Dream Mirror
description:
You are transported to a magical world where you can Interact with immersive environments to solve challenging puzzles. Where you get to find different types of mystical ancient devices in form of keys, which will help you to open portals to different worlds.

Key features

  • Listen to your own music, inside the game via built in music player
  • Explore the vast Space Station which revolves around the Earths Orbit.
  • Visit Artistic Italian styled islands with a coastal beach with an enjoyable balloon ride. Were you can get a full top down scenic view of the complete island and experience the most beautiful underwater.
  • Experience polygon style Amazing farms with big trees and forest.
  • Artistic scenic castle with torture devices and realistic fearful stereo sound effects to your mood.
  • Mystical Egyptian tomb on the banks of the Nile surrounded by pyramids like settlements.
  • Modern house for you to relax enjoy the couch or play darts you can also doodle with chalks.
  • Spiritual forest with lots of animals like deer, rabbits, butterfly and Even God rays !!
  • View an alien planet with alien life forms and an enjoy the immersive experience.
  • Discover many different animals including Deer, Sharks, Butterflies, Rabbits, Fish, Birds and many more...
  • Explore a range of locomotion options including blink teleport, seamless movement and snap rotation.
  • Each environment has been carefully crafted to influence specific emotional states
  • Turn off the music and experience a world filled with the calming, soothing sounds of nature

Notes

  • Exclusively for Oculus Rift/ Rift S or Quest 2 connected via PC.
  • This game and was inspired from Stargate SG1 and my first VR experience Oculus Dreamdeck Demo and it aims for quality and not quantity.
  • Children and family friendly content
